content.prompt: If a manufacturing company uses a single, weight-losing raw material to manufacture its finished product, then most likely the company will

choices.label: locate several manufacturing plants close to consumers
locate its manufacturing plant at the raw material site

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
